channel.title: I cant find my user name in my db to change rank or stats? all i see is PRIMARY
channel.description: I GOT MY CLIENT AND EVERYTHING WORKING, I AM ABLE TO LOG INTO CLIENT NOW, BUT I CANT FIND MY USER NAME IN THE RSCD DB TO CHANGE THE STATS AND RANK OF MY PLAYER SOMEONE HELP?

item.title: I cant find my user name in my db to change rank or stats? all i see is PRIMARY
item.dc:creator: @airborne airborne
item.description:
@airborne wrote:

after you get on, log off. Then go to your source folder, and go to characters. Find your character file, open it, and look for something that says:

character-rights = 0

Find that, and once you do, change the zero, to the following below:

playerRights = 1 //player Mod playerRights = 2//Global Mod playerRights = 3// Owner playerRights = 20 // Root administrator (IDK what this one is, if you are owner, stick to three.
So if you want owner, make it like this:

character-rights = 3

Save, and log back on your character

I think this is what you mean.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant find my user name in my db to change rank or stats? all i see is PRIMARY
